sentences: Klassivennad on kõik trüginud tähtsatesse ametitesse, tema üksi on jäänud reameheks.
context: In Estonian, 'reamees' has two main meanings: 1) A military rank equivalent to a private or common soldier in all armed forces except the navy, and 2) An ordinary/simple/common person. The word is formed from 'rea' (line/row) + 'mees' (man), literally meaning 'line man', which refers to soldiers who stand in formation lines rather than officers.
